name: Knucklebones (Manilux)
description:
This game is just the "Knucklebones" minigame from Cult of the Lamb.

I fell totally in love with Cult of the Lamb and it gave me the idea to recreate this minigame playable on mobile.  This is just a tiny project I did when I was sick. For the moment it's really ugly but someone is currently working on the sprites.

You can play the web version on this page and I will add a download link for the APK if anyone is interested.
